client-settings.name: 公益社団法人 京都府観光連盟

extension-param.param-value: style:#site-translate-header-wrapper{width:100%!important;height:44px;position:fixed;top:0;z-index:9999}#site-translate-header-wrapper p{font-size:10px;line-height:12px}#site-translate-message{display:table-cell;height:44px;vertical-align:middle;width:5000px}#container{margin:40px auto 0}#header{top:44px}.tblType02 th{width:25%}.facCont h4 a{font-size:80%}.siteID a{font-size:152%}.slideTtl{font-size:320%;letter-spacing:normal;line-height:1.75}.mainTtl h2{font-size:242%} .searchMonth li { padding: 0 8px; } .searchMonthSelect { padding: 0; } .more_sports, .more_event, .more_spot { width: 50%; } .ttl04 .line span { padding: 0 10px; } .iconUmi{-webkit-background-size:140px auto;background-size:140px auto;padding-left:140px}.iconTake{-webkit-background-size:202px auto;background-size:202px auto;padding-left:202px}.iconMori{-webkit-background-size:143px auto;background-size:143px auto;padding-left:143px}.iconOcha{-webkit-background-size:168px auto;background-size:168px auto;padding-left:168px} @media screen and (max-width: 1350px){.ctgCal .btnList a,.ctgFct .btnList a,.ctgVlt .btnList a{bottom:7%}}@media screen and (max-width: 768px){*{letter-spacing:normal!important}#container{margin:80px 0 0}.ctgCal .btnList a{bottom:26%}.ctgFct .btnList a,.ctgVlt .btnList a{bottom:22%}.iconUmi{-webkit-background-size:113px auto;background-size:113px auto;padding-left:113px}.iconTake{-webkit-background-size:161px auto;background-size:161px auto;padding-left:161px}.iconMori{-webkit-background-size:112px auto;background-size:112px auto;padding-left:112px}.iconOcha{-webkit-background-size:128px auto;background-size:128px auto;padding-left:128px}}@media screen and (max-width:690px){.slideTtl{font-size:290%}}@media screen and (max-width:650px){.slideTtl{font-size:265%}}@media screen and (max-width:590px){.slideTtl{font-size:255%}}@media screen and (max-width:510px){.slideTtl{font-size:200%}}@media screen and (max-width:450px){.slideTtl{font-size:183%}}@media screen and (max-width:390px){.slideTtl{font-size:165%}}@media screen and (max-width:355px){.slideTtl{font-size:147%}}@media screen and (max-width:320px){.slideTtl{font-size:140%}}
